舜.definition: Shun (c. 23rd century BC), mythical sage and leader

舜帝陵.definition: several tombs of legendary Emperor Shun, one in Ningyuan county 寧遠縣|宁远县[Ning2 yuan3 xian4] in southwest Hunan, another Yuncheng prefecture 運城|运城[Yun4 cheng2] Shanxi

舜日堯天.definition: sage Emperors Shun and Yao rule every day (idiom); all for the best in the best of all possible worlds

舜日堯年.definition: sage Emperors Shun and Yao rule every day (idiom); all for the best in the best of all possible worlds
